p: The pH and total SCFA were not affected by the treatments ( Table 2). The CTR had the highest values (% of the SCFA) for iso-butyrate (1.74) ( P = 0.003) and for iso-valerate (3.11) ( P < 0.001), as compared to the other treatments (on average 1.62 and 2.79, respectively, for iso-butyrate and iso-valerate). Bornyl acetate and CAM reduced valerate (on average 1.69, % SCFA) as compared to CTR (1.81) ( P = 0.04). The acetate to propionate ratio was not affected by the treatment ( P = 0.299).
